LanguageData.AYHerbsSimple.label: 藥草學 (初級)
LanguageData.AYHerbsSimple.description: 殖民者能種植簡單的藥草.
LanguageData.AYHerbsIntermediate.label: 藥草學 (中級)
LanguageData.AYHerbsIntermediate.description: 殖民者能種植少見的草藥.
LanguageData.AYHerbsComplex.label: 藥草學 (高級)
LanguageData.AYHerbsComplex.description: 殖民者能種植生長週期長的藥草.
LanguageData.AYHerbsYield.label: 藥草學產量
LanguageData.AYHerbsYield.description: 能夠提高藥草的收穫量.
LanguageData.AYTallow.label: 脂塊
LanguageData.AYTallow.description: 解鎖製造脂塊和相關產品的選單.
LanguageData.AYCharcoal.label: 木炭
LanguageData.AYCharcoal.description: 解鎖製造木炭及相關產品的選單.
LanguageData.AYPowders.label: 粉末
LanguageData.AYPowders.description: 解鎖將藥草乾燥後研磨的相關選單.
LanguageData.AYExtracts.label: 萃取
LanguageData.AYExtracts.description: 解鎖從藥草提取精油及其他有用物質的相關選單.
LanguageData.AYSalts.label: 鹽類
LanguageData.AYSalts.description: 解鎖鹽類的製造選單,在酏劑出現前的主流用藥方式.
LanguageData.AYTeas.label: 草藥茶
LanguageData.AYTeas.description: 解鎖制備草藥茶的選單.
LanguageData.AYElixirs.label: 酏劑
LanguageData.AYOintments.label: 軟膏
LanguageData.AYTonics.label: 補品
